languages.text: "Человек перед вами — бывший капитан контрабандистского судна, принадлежавшего синдикату. Проверьте левую руку еретика — все преступники имели характерный имплант, по которому узнавали друг друга. Его сигнатуру Глейто и обнаружил во время патрулирования".

traits.locale_text: "Человек перед вами — капитан контрабандистского судна синдиката "Тени бездны". Если сомневаетесь — проверьте его левую руку. Все преступники имели характерный имплант, по которому узнавали друг друга. Его сигнатуру Глейто и поймал во время инспекции помещений".
traits.speaker: SolomorneCompanion

languages.text: "The man before you is the former captain of a smuggling ship owned by the syndicate. Check the heretic's left arm — every syndicate member had a distinctive implant by which they recognised each other. It was that implant's signature that Glaito picked up on during his patrols."
languages.original_text: "Человек перед вами — бывший капитан контрабандистского судна, принадлежавшего синдикату. Проверьте левую руку еретика — все преступники имели характерный имплант, по которому узнавали друг друга. Его сигнатуру Глейто и обнаружил во время патрулирования".

traits.locale_text: "The man before you is the former captain of a smuggling ship owned by the syndicate. Check the heretic's left arm — every syndicate member had a distinctive implant by which they recognised each other. It was his signature that Glaito picked up on during his patrols."

"The man before you is the former captain of a smuggling ship owned by the syndicate. Check the heretic's left arm — every syndicate member had a distinctive implant by which they recognised each other. It was that implant's signature that Glaito picked up on during his patrols."

languages.text: 「目の前にいる男は、あの犯罪組織が所有していた密輸船の元船長です。異端者の左腕を確認してください。組織の構成員は皆、互いを識別するための特殊なインプラントを埋め込まれています。グライトが巡回中に感知したのは、そのインプラントの識別信号です」
languages.original_text: "The man before you is the former captain of a smuggling ship owned by the syndicate. Check the heretic's left arm — every syndicate member had a distinctive implant by which they recognised each other. It was that implant's signature that Glaito picked up on during his patrols."

traits.locale_text: 「目の前にいる男は、あの犯罪組織が所有していた密輸船の元船長です。異端者の左腕を確認してください。組織の構成員は皆、互いを識別するための特殊なインプラントを埋め込まれています。グライトが巡回中に感知したのは、そのインプラントの識別信号です」

languages.text: "Önünüzdeki bu adam, suç örgütüne ait kaçakçılık gemisinin eski kaptanıdır. Kâfirin sol koluna bir bakın... Bu suç örgütünün her bir mensubunda, diğerlerini tanımak için kullandıkları ayırt edici bir implant vardır. Glaito da devriye sırasında kendisi bu implantın imzası sayesinde tespit etmişti."
languages.original_text: "The man before you is the former captain of a smuggling ship owned by the syndicate. Check the heretic's left arm — every syndicate member had a distinctive implant by which they recognised each other. It was that implant's signature that Glaito picked up on during his patrols."

traits.locale_text: "Önünüzdeki bu adam, suç örgütüne ait kaçakçılık gemisinin eski kaptanıdır. Kâfirin sol koluna bir bakın... Bu suç örgütünün her bir üyesinde, diğerlerini tanımak için kullandıkları ayırt edici bir implant vardır. Glaito da devriye sırasında kendisi bu implantın imzası sayesinde tespit etmişti."

languages.text: «El hombre que tiene delante fue capitán de una nave contrabandista perteneciente al sindicato. Mire el brazo izquierdo del hereje: todos los miembros tenían un implante característico por el que se reconocían entre ellos. Fue la señal del implante lo que Glaito detectó durante sus patrullas».
languages.original_text: "The man before you is the former captain of a smuggling ship owned by the syndicate. Check the heretic's left arm — every syndicate member had a distinctive implant by which they recognised each other. It was that implant's signature that Glaito picked up on during his patrols."

traits.locale_text: «El hombre que tiene delante fue capitán de una nave contrabandista perteneciente al sindicato. Mire el brazo izquierdo del hereje: todos los miembros tenían un implante característico por el que se reconocían entre ellos. Fue la señal del implante lo que Glaito detectó durante sus patrullas».

languages.text: “你面前的这个人，以前是那个犯罪集团走私船的船长。只要检查一下这个异端分子的左臂就知道了，那个集团的每位成员体内都埋下了特别的植入物，他们会通过这个印记辨别身份。格雷托在巡逻的时候，探测到了那个植入物发出的信号。”
languages.original_text: "The man before you is the former captain of a smuggling ship owned by the syndicate. Check the heretic's left arm — every syndicate member had a distinctive implant by which they recognised each other. It was that implant's signature that Glaito picked up on during his patrols."

traits.locale_text: “你面前的这个人，以前是那个犯罪集团走私船的船长。只要检查一下这个异端分子的左臂就知道了，那个集团的每位成员体内都埋下了特别的植入物，他们会通过这个印记辨别身份。格雷托在巡逻的时候，探测到了那个植入物发出的信号。”

languages.text: « L'hérétique qui se tient devant vous est l'ancien capitaine d'un vaisseau de contrebande des Ombres des abysses. Regardez son bras gauche : tous les membres de son syndicat portent un implant spécial, qui fait office de signe de reconnaissance. Et Glaito a détecté la signature de cet implant lors de l'une de ses patrouilles. »
languages.original_text: "The man before you is the former captain of a smuggling ship owned by the syndicate. Check the heretic's left arm — every syndicate member had a distinctive implant by which they recognised each other. It was that implant's signature that Glaito picked up on during his patrols."

traits.locale_text: « L'hérétique qui se tient devant vous est l'ancien capitaine d'un vaisseau de contrebande des Ombres des abysses. Regardez son bras gauche : tous les membres de son syndicat portent un implant spécial, qui fait office de signe de reconnaissance. Et Glaito a détecté la signature de cet implant lors de l'une de ses patrouilles. »

languages.text: "Der Mann vor Euch war Kapitän eines Schmuggelschiffs des Syndikats. Seht Euch den linken Arm des Ketzers an ... alle Mitglieder des Syndikats hatten ein Implantat, an dem sie sich gegenseitig erkannten. Es war die Signatur dieses Implantats, die Glaito während einer seiner Patrouillen geortet hat."
languages.original_text: "The man before you is the former captain of a smuggling ship owned by the syndicate. Check the heretic's left arm — every syndicate member had a distinctive implant by which they recognised each other. It was that implant's signature that Glaito picked up on during his patrols."

traits.locale_text: "Der Mann vor Euch war Kapitän eines Schmuggelschiffs des Syndikats. Seht Euch den linken Arm des Ketzers an ... alle Mitglieder des Syndikats hatten ein Implantat, an dem sie sich gegenseitig erkannten. Es war die Signatur dieses Implantats, die Glaito während einer seiner Patrouillen geortet hat."
